Title: 7:00 A.M.-8:00 A.M.
Plot:
Nina and Tony discover the identity of the mole who is working for Gaines.

Teri and Kim are finally reunited.

Still under Gaines' control, Jack goes to the Palmer breakfast, where he learns what Gaines has planned for him.  Jack manages to foil the assassination attempt, but is captured by Secret Service in the process.
GuestStars: Jackie Debatin,  Jesse D. Goins,  Mark Clayman,  Ron Rogg√©
